children.subject: hopefully sometime this weekend but definitely before next wednesday
When will we find out if we have been accepted as an AI?

Hi, unfortunately, due to network issues I was not able to fill the form on time last night. Please allow me to fill it now. I really enjoyed my time as the AI the last sem for Data 8 and hope to continue it. Apologies again.

history.content:
Hello everyone!!

We're looking for students at UC Berkeley who have taken Data 8, received a B or better (or a P for Spring 2020 or Fall 2020), are passionate about the course, and have the potential to become tutors and UGSIs in future semesters, to be Academic Interns for Spring 2021. 

 

Serving as an Academic Intern is a great way to help current students achieve mastery and have a good experience in Data 8. It is also a great way to prepare for becoming a tutor or UGSI in the future!

RESPONSIBILITIES
All Academic Interns enroll in a mandatory 1-unit P/NP class offered by the course faculty. This corresponds to three hours of time commitment per week.The typical breakdown of the three hours is:
- 1 hour of preparation (e.g. studying the week’s assignments, consulting with senior staff, etc.)
- 1 hour of assisting students
- 1 hour for pedagogy practice, (U)GSI check-ins, AI team meetings, etc

APPLICATION DEADLINE: Wednesday, 1/20 at 11:59pm PST

If you have any questions, feel free to send them to katherinetsai@berkeley.edu.

Here is the link: https://forms.gle/cPNkHxvXevcKvXVn7
